Job Description: Roles and Responsibilities  Primary responsibilities for Front End Developer. Convert UX design to Html design using jquery, bootstap, javascript and cssDesired Candidate Profile  Front End Developer should have technical skills and strong interpersonal skills to be effective on the job, including:Proficiency in website programming languages such as HTML, C#, CSS, Python, C++ and JavaScript. Angular JS a plus.Understanding of key website design principles and SEO optimizationAbility to use client input to create functional, creative and user-friendly webpagesAbility to test and debug websitesAnalytical and detail-orientedExcellent verbal and written communication skillsAdvanced problem-solving skillsObservant and able to remain focused on tasks for long periods of timePerks and Benefits  You will get a great opportunity to be part of the ambitious plans we have for growing one of the most important parts of our organization. We will support you in your professional and personal development, by providing you with access to LinkedIn Learning and many high-quality training courses to increase your technical knowledge and expertise. You will also get opportunity to work with passionate team members and stay connected as one family.
UG: Any Graduate in Any Specialization, BCA in Any Specialization, B.Tech/B.E. in Any Specialization
